mapper.insert: INSERT INTO chat_message ( id, session_id, sender_id, receiver_id, content_type, content, status, extra, create_time ) VALUES ( #{id}, #{sessionId}, #{senderId}, #{receiverId}, #{contentType}, #{content}, #{status}, #{extra}, #{createTime} )
mapper.select: SELECT * FROM chat_message WHERE session_id = #{sessionId} ORDER BY create_time DESC LIMIT 1
